diff_hunk:

           expected_shape=expected_shape)
 
   def __str__(self):

body:
Done, except for the second part. The reason I did `self.dtype().name` is because of this method in Variable: https://github.com/iRapha/tensorflow/blob/ab88819372cd83cb3db7fa5419946e3e4846ba29/tensorflow/python/ops/variables.py#L745

But I can change if `self.dtype` is better
